content:
To assist you in creating an Active Directory (AD) account at the IRFU, I will need to gather some context and information. Please provide me with the following details:

1. The name of the person who needs the AD account created.
2. The department or group they belong to within the organization.
3. The desired username for the new account.
4. The desired password for the new account (if you can, please provide a strong password).
5. Any specific permissions or group memberships that should be assigned to the new account.

Once I have this information, I will be able to guide you through the process of creating the AD account at the IRFU.
